definition: (idiom) sunlight shines over all things/drenched in sunlight
according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before

sentences.english: I was so relaxed by my day at the beach, that I fell asleep in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 在阳光普照的海滩上，我放松得睡着了。

sentences.english: Everythingthe light touches is our kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 阳光普照之处皆是我们的国土。

sentences.english: So she's been eyeing a sun-drenched section of our back fence.
sentences.chinese: 所以，她一直盯著一个阳光普照的一段我们回来围栏。

sentences.english: High in the sunlit silence. Hov'ring there
sentences.chinese: 在阳光普照的寂静高天。

sentences.english: Go to the bank of the Yangtse River, it's warm and sunny, trees are thriving and flowers are blossoming.
sentences.chinese: 去长江沿岸，那里温暖阳光普照，树木繁茂花朵盛开。

sentences.english: The whole room was flooded with warm, golden sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 温暖的金色阳光普照整个房间。

sentences.english: Away over their crests opened out a broad, sunny landscape.
sentences.chinese: 梢望过去，展现着一片宽阔的阳光普照的美景。

sentences.english: I really ought to drag myself outside, but there'd be the sun.
sentences.chinese: 我真想拖着病体到外面去，外面阳光普照。

sentences.english: B:Go to the bank of the Yangtse River,it's warm and sunny,trees are thriving and flowers are blossoming.
sentences.chinese: 去长江沿岸，那里温暖阳光普照，树木繁茂花朵盛开。
以及雨后开朗，阳光普照。

sentences.english: Sunshine, flowers, spring colors the earth to green.
sentences.chinese: 阳光普照，鸟语花香，春天绿了大地。

sentences.english: We had glorious weather for our cruise, sunshine all day and every day.
sentences.chinese: 我们这次巡航天气实在太好了，一连几天阳光普照。

sentences.english: We had glorious weather for our cruise, sunshine all day and every day .
sentences.chinese: 我们这次巡航天气实在太好了，一连几天阳光普照。

sentences.english: Where the sun enters the doctor does not.
sentences.chinese: 阳光普照处，医生无需入。

sentences.english: I find them every year, Growing in the sunshine, Knowing spring is here.
sentences.chinese: 我每年都观赏他们，阳光普照下盛开春来了。

sentences.english: Because of the warm and sunny weather, oranges grow very well here.
sentences.chinese: 由于温暖及阳光普照的天气，柑桔成长得非常好。

definition: moderate wind, beautiful sun (idiom); fine sunny weather, esp. in springtime
(of the sunlight) to bathe all things/to shine gloriously
see 秋高氣爽|秋高气爽[qiu1 gao1 qi4 shuang3]
lit. birdsong and fragrant flowers (idiom); fig. the intoxication of a beautiful spring day
four seasons like spring/favorable climate throughout the year
